items.title: 'An impossible task?' Winless run leaves West Ham facing drop
items.summary: Booed off the pitch after conceding a late winner at home against their relegation rivals and on a 10-game winless run - these are desperate times for West Ham.

items.title: Sources: United approach Carrick, Solskjaer
items.summary: Manchester United have held "early-stage informal talks" with several potential interim managers, including Ole Gunnar Solskjaer and Michael Carrick, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Chelsea name Rosenior as coach on 5¬Ω-year deal
items.summary: Chelsea have announced the appointment of Liam Rosenior as their new head coach on a 5¬Ω-year contract.

items.title: Messi prefers ownership to coaching after career
items.summary: Lionel Messi said Tuesday that he does not see a future for himself as a manager, but would like to be a club owner someday.

items.title: Rangers have dragged themselves back into title race - but Rohl wants more
items.summary: Rangers have made a "statement" by moving to within three points of Scottish Premiership leaders Hearts - but head coach Danny Rohl says moving above Celtic into second place is "still not what we want".

items.title: Late Gibbs-White penalty sinks helpless Hammers
items.summary: A late Morgan Gibbs-White penalty gave Nottingham Forest a crucial away victory over West Ham, leaving the London side seven points adrift of safety.

items.title: Uitblinker Summerville kan niet voorkomen dat positie Nuno nog meer wankelt
items.summary: Het einde van Nuno Espirito Santo als manager van West Ham United lijkt nabij. Zijn ploeg verloor de degradatiekraker van zijn oude club Nottingham Forest: 1-2.

items.title: Sparta lijkt strijd om Van Crooij te winnen na onderhoud in Venlo
items.summary: Vito van Crooij (29) gaat - mits er geen calamiteiten plaatsvinden - aan de slag bij Sparta Rotterdam. De ploeg pikt de vleugelaanvaller op bij NEC, bevestigen ingewijden. Daarmee is de opvolger van de aan AZ verkochte Ayoub Oufkir bijna binnen.

items.title: Oliver Glasner set to decide on Crystal Palace contract and hints at Gu√©hi sale
items.summary: Resolution has been delayed by packed fixture schedule Manager says defender may be sold for the right price Oliver Glasner expects to decide in the coming weeks whether he will sign a new contract at Crystal Palace and has said Marc Gu√©hi could be sold this month if his ‚Äúthreshold‚Äù is met. items.title: Interim boss Fletcher sought Ferguson 'blessing'
items.summary: Darren Fletcher says he sought the blessing of his old Manchester United boss Sir Alex Ferguson before taking interim charge at the Old Trafford club.

items.title: Nottingham Forest add to West Ham‚Äôs woes as Gibbs-White seals late fightback win
items.summary: West Ham are drifting towards the most gutless of relegations. The London Stadium was half empty on another dismal night, encapsulating the apathy gripping this miserable club, and it is hard to see a way out for Nuno Esp√≠rito Santo‚Äôs accident prone side after a combination of ¬≠misfortune and dismal defending left them seven points below Nottingham Forest in 17th place. There was a disallowed goal for Crysencio Summerville when West Ham were leading 1-0 at the start of the second half. Nuno had charged around his technical area, a big grin spread across his face, but he was watching in despair moments later. Forest replied straight away, Nicol√°s Dom√≠nguez heading in an opportunistic equaliser, and they boosted their survival hopes when a clumsy attempt at a clearing punch from Alphonse Areola sparked the video assistant referee review that ended with Morgan Gibbs-White scoring the winning penalty in the 89th minute. Continue reading...

items.title: Van Persie wil na wisselen van aanvoerder niets weten van spijt
items.summary: Robin van Persie benoemde nieuwkomer Sem Steijn aan het begin van dit seizoen als de aanvoerder van Feyenoord, maar na een paar maanden heeft de coach besloten om de band door te geven aan Timon Wellenreuther. Dat betekent niet dat Van Persie spijt heeft van de keuze die hij een paar maanden geleden nam.

items.title: Forest turn up heat on Nuno as West Ham sink deeper into trouble
items.summary: West Ham United are seven points from safety after a late Morgan Gibbs-White penalty - awarded by VAR - sent Nottingham Forest to a 2-1 win.

items.title: Dit is het schema van de kwartfinale van de Afrika Cup
items.summary: De achtste finales van de Afrika Cup zitten erop, wat betekent dat het tijd is voor de kwartfinales. Na twee rustdagen gaat het toernooi vrijdag verder. We zetten de wedstrijden op een rij.
